rules_text:
When Naumachian Games enters the battlefield, create a Pilum Arms token. You may attach it to target creature you control. [i](It’s an Equipment with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and equip {3}. Attaching an Arms to a creature unattaches any others.)[/i]
Whenever an Equipment becomes attached to a creature you control, you may tap or untap target creature.
